original_text: Then two wicked men came and they sat near to him. They accused Naboth so that the people could all hear them. They said, ‘Naboth has insulted God and the king.’ So the people took him outside the city. They threw stones at him until he was dead.
korean_text: 때에 불량자 두 사람이 들어와 그의 앞에 앉고 백성 앞에서 나봇에게 대하여 증언을 하여 이르기를 나봇이 하나님과 왕을 저주하였다 하매 무리가 그를 성읍 밖으로 끌고 나가서 돌로 쳐죽이고

sentences.original_text: and they sat near to him
so that the people could all hear them
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람들이 그들을 들을 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: They said, 'Naboth has insulted God and the king'

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들은 그를 성 밖으로 끌고 갔습니다
